author: marekm3498
content: The one small thing: Tim used ChainId 123, so if we want to use 1643 we should change it here https://github.com/ethereum/eth1.0-specs/blob/master/network-upgrades/client-integration-testnets/calaveras.md

author: holiman
content: Oh, I had missed that. 123 wfm, doesn't change the hash.
